data.actual_result: The member list will be in an infinite loading state until you unmute the channel that caused this
data.expected_result: It should just mute the channel without putting the member list in a loading state
data.short_description: When unmuting many channels in a big guild, the member list all the sudden goes into a forever loading state OR if you right click many times on channels in a big guild
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a big server (this for me in testers and OGHS) - Right click > Mute channel on a few channels - Observe the member list - OR - Right click a few times on a few channels - Observe the member list
